titleStmt.title: Canticum morientis cygni, or, The last dying note of Stephen the first gospel-martyr opened and improved in a sermon preached at Alhallows Barking, London, 17 Septemb. 1658, at the funeral of Mr. Andrew Bassano, gentleman, and since in some particulars enlarged by William Tutty ...
titleStmt.author: Tutty, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
